{{cpp/title|begin{{petty|(std::initializer_list)}}}}
{{cpp/utility/initializer_list/navbar}}
{{ddcla|header=initializer_list|since=c++11|constexpr=c++14|
template&lt; class E &gt; 
const E* begin( std::initializer_list&lt;E&gt; il ) noexcept;
}}

{{lc|std::begin}} 对 {{tt|initializer_list}} 的重载返回指向 {{c|il}} 首元素的指针。

===参数===
{{par begin}}
{{par|il|{{tt|initializer_list}}}}
{{par end}} 

===返回值===
{{c|il.begin()}}

===示例===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;algorithm&gt;
#include &lt;initializer_list&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;iterator&gt;

int main() 
{
    std::initializer_list ϕ = {'1', '.', '6', '1', '8', '0'};

    std::copy(std::begin(ϕ),
              std::end(ϕ),
              std::ostream_iterator&lt;char&gt;(std::cout, ""));

    std::cout &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
1.6180
}}
